main.name: Ameer Hamza
main.description: I work on Frontend currently focused on WEB3.0
main.bio: Hi there! I am Ameer Hamza! You might be looking for Frontend Developer for your growing team then you are on the right place. I've been coding for over 2+ years now. I am experienced in working Agile environment As a Frontend developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. I develop applications and determine the structure and design of web pages, striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design, and ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones. I design the applications by using Tailwind, bootstrap, Material Ui, styled-components and custom styling(SCSS). I build web apps by converting the PSD and Figma design into responsive screens.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you want me to be part of your growing team.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Building the fullstack Application with .NetCore and (React/Angular).
